query:
ALTER TABLE paymentSettings 
ADD COLUMN stripeConnectedAccountId VARCHAR(255) AFTER stripeTestMode,
ADD COLUMN stripeAccessToken TEXT AFTER stripeConnectedAccountId,
ADD COLUMN stripeRefreshToken TEXT AFTER stripeAccessToken,
ADD COLUMN stripeAccountStatus ENUM('connected', 'disconnected', 'pending') DEFAULT 'disconnected' AFTER stripeRefreshToken,
ADD COLUMN stripeConnectedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER stripeAccountStatus;
